statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, design_ideas FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY designer_id DESC;
SELECT designer_name, resources_available FROM fashion_designers WHERE design_ideas LIKE '%clothing%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT designer_id, designer_name FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_name LIKE 'A%' OR designer_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT designer_name, design_ideas FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, COUNT(*) AS design_count FROM fashion_designers GROUP BY designer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT designer_name, JSON_EXTRACT(resources_available, '$.budget') AS budget FROM fashion_designers WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(resources_available, JSON_ARRAY('sewing machine'));
SELECT designer_name, design_ideas FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_name LIKE '%a%' AND designer_name LIKE '%o%';
SELECT * FROM designer
SELECT designer_name, email FROM designer ORDER BY designer_name DESC
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM design_resource WHERE designer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM design_resource WHERE resource_description LIKE '%example%'
SELECT designer_name, location FROM designer WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM designer ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, email FROM designer WHERE location='New York';
SELECT designer.designer_id, COUNT(*) as total_resources FROM designer JOIN design_resource ON designer.designer_id = design_resource.designer_id GROUP BY designer.designer_id;

SELECT designer.designer_id, designer.designer_name, design_resource.resource_name FROM designer JOIN design_resource ON designer.designer_id = design_resource.designer_id WHERE designer.location='Paris' AND design_resource.resource_description LIKE '%decor%' ORDER BY designer.designer_name;

SELECT designer.designer_name, design_resource.resource_name, design_resource.resource_description FROM designer LEFT JOIN design_resource ON designer.designer_id = design_resource.designer_id WHERE design_resource.designer_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM designer;
SELECT name, location FROM designer ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT idea_id, idea_description FROM design_ideas WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM design_resources WHERE category = 'Tools';
SELECT MAX(idea_id) FROM design_ideas;
SELECT * FROM designer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM designer WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM design_ideas WHERE designer_id = 1 ORDER BY idea_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM design_resources WHERE resource_name LIKE 'S%';

SELECT designer.name, design_ideas.idea_description, design_resources.url FROM designer JOIN design_ideas ON designer.id = design_ideas.designer_id JOIN design_resources ON design_ideas.idea_id = design_resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM designer;
SELECT designer_name, designer_email FROM designer;
SELECT idea_description, idea_image_url FROM design_ideas;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_link FROM resources;
SELECT designer_name, designer_email, designer_location FROM designer;
SELECT * FROM designer;
SELECT designer_name, designer_email FROM designer ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT designer_name, designer_location FROM designer WHERE designer_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM design_ideas WHERE idea_description LIKE '%innovative%';
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'tool';
SELECT * FROM designer;
SELECT designer_name, location FROM designer WHERE location='New York';
SELECT idea_description, designer_id FROM design_idea ORDER BY idea_id DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resource WHERE designer_id=2;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM designer WHERE designer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT designer_name, location FROM designer ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resource WHERE designer_id = 3;
SELECT idea_description FROM design_idea WHERE designer_id = 1 ORDER BY idea_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM event WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
